alert.note: Alert for Owen (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 5:09PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN OWEN COUNTY THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 509 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Frankfort, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Monterey, Elk Lake, Beechwood, Needmore, New Columbus, Harmony and Natlee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
